title: Is the ec campus stricter than rr?
content:
I've heard people telling that the ec campus is really strict and has exams every week, is this true?
Also how is the social situation at ec campus?

comments.body:
One thing 
Teachers are shit here in ec , as far as exams are concerned , both the campuses have exams at the same time and follow the same syllabus .
So the one exam a week thing is true?
Not anymore. Things have changed for good now. Back to 2 ISAs and ESA System per subject. Applies to both campuses.
Yea, exams wise it's quite the same. You get access to slides and materials on PESU Academy, the same thing for all. You'll end up using Vibha's notes anyway XD
It's not very strict tbh. It is less strict compared to 2021ish tho that time was more cuz of covid.
Could I DM you on some of my queries about the campus?

If you're talking abt ece in ec campus it's a lot stricter than rr. The teachers monitir you a lot and call your parents and stuff for small things like you're in a school lol. It'll also be really bad if you get caught bunking classes unlike in rr
